classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as organic carbonic acids. These are compounds comprising the carbonic acid functional group.

mixture.name: Sha-lem
mixture.ingredients: Bismuth subcarbonate + Boric acid + Oleic Acid + Palmitic Acid + Stearic acid

mixture.name: Estomarol
mixture.ingredients: Aluminum hydroxide + Bismuth subcarbonate + Calcium carbonate + Magnesium carbonate + Sodium bicarbonate

mixture.name: Hemorro-dol Sup
mixture.ingredients: Balsam of Peru + Belladonna + Benzocaine + Bismuth subcarbonate + Bismuth subnitrate + Boric acid + Ephedrine + Zinc oxide
